title: 720 Linden Street
description: 720 LINDEN STREET * A BDSM EROTIC ROMANCE * BOOK 2 in the JESSIE HAYES SERIES* Following Jessie Hayes' kinky introduction to BDSM at 1462 South Broadway, she now embraces her shameless journey into eroticism. Now her eyes are open to all the filthy desires hidden behind the doors of the exclusive sex club, 1462. The charged eroticism and steamy sex lead her headlong into an epic romance. But passionate romance cannot take away the undeniable temptation she feels for a forbidden co-worker. 720 Linden Street is filled with heady desire, impossible choices and raw kinky sex.  Warning: Explicit sex
author: K.C. Decker
